body_html:
I simply added
'from caffe2.python.helpers import db_input'
in model_helper.py and fixed this bug.
But I encountered another problem:
RuntimeError: [enforce fail at db.h:190] db_. Cannot open db: test of type lmdb Error from operator:
output: "dbreader_test" name: "" type: "CreateDB" arg { name: "db" s: "test" } arg { name: "db_type" s: "lmdb" }
Can anyboby tell me how to deal with it???

body:
I simply added
'from caffe2.python.helpers import db_input'
in model_helper.py and fixed this bug.
But I encountered another problem:  
RuntimeError: [enforce fail at db.h:190] db_. Cannot open db: test of type lmdb Error from operator: 
output: "dbreader_test" name: "" type: "CreateDB" arg { name: "db" s: "test" } arg { name: "db_type" s: "lmdb" }
Can anyboby tell me how to deal with it???
